Blade's End.name: Blade's End
Blade's End.blurb: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.
Blade's End.description: Innate: Talon's abilities wound enemy  champions and epic  monsters every time they deal damage, lasting 6 seconds and stacking up to 3 times. Basic attacks refresh the duration on-hit.
Blade's End.description2: Talon's next basic attack against a target with 3 wounds will consume them, causing the target to bleed for 75 − 245 (based on level) (+ 200% bonus AD)  physical damage over 2 seconds, with each tick occurring every 0.125 seconds.

Noxian Diplomacy.name: Noxian Diplomacy
Noxian Diplomacy.blurb: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
Noxian Diplomacy.description: Active: Noxian Diplomacy has a different effect depending on the  range with target.
Noxian Diplomacy.description2: Standard - Outside 170 units: Talon  dashes onto his target, dealing physical damage.
Noxian Diplomacy.description3: Melee - Within 170 units: Talon skewers his target, causing Noxian Diplomacy to  critically strike for (50% +  25%) bonus physical damage.
Noxian Diplomacy.description4: If Noxian Diplomacy kills its target, Talon  heals for  20 − 71 (based on level) and 50% of its  cooldown is refunded.
Noxian Diplomacy.description5: The melee version of Noxian Diplomacy resets Talon's autoattack timer.
Noxian Diplomacy.notes:
* While  grounded or  rooted only the melee version of this ability may be used.
 The ranged version of Noxian Diplomacy causes Talon to follow all of the target's movements (through  blinks,  dashes, etc) until he reaches them.
 This does not occur on far distance travel ( Recall,  Teleport).

Rake.name: Rake
Rake.blurb: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
Rake.description: Active: Talon sends out a volley of daggers, dealing physical damage to all enemies they pass through.
Rake.description2: The daggers linger for 0.75 seconds before flying back to Talon, dealing physical damage to all enemies they pass through and  slowing them for 1 second.
Rake.leveling2:
Return Physical Damage:70 / 85 / 100 / 115 / 130 (+ 60% bonus AD)Total Physical Damage:120 / 150 / 180 / 210 / 240 (+ 100% bonus AD)
Slow:40 / 45 / 50 / 55 / 60%
Rake.notes: * If Talon dies while Rake is mid-air the projectiles will still complete their travel.

Assassin's Path.name: Assassin's Path
Assassin's Path.blurb: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
Assassin's Path.description: Active: Talon  dashes a maximum of 800 units over the target structure or piece of terrain, with the dash's speed based on his own  movement speed.
Assassin's Path.description2: Talon cannot cast Assassin's Path on the same area of terrain for a set duration.
Assassin's Path.notes:
* Assassin's Path can be cast on artificial terrain ( Crystallize,  Pillar of Ice,  Weaver's Wall).
 They are only considered one-time use and do not have a practical cooldown.

Shadow Assault.name: Shadow Assault
Shadow Assault.blurb: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
Shadow Assault.description: Active: Talon disperses a ring of blades, dealing physical damage to all enemies hit, while gaining  invisibility and  bonus movement speed for up to 2.5 seconds.
Shadow Assault.leveling: Physical Damage:90 / 112.5 / 135 / 157.5 / 180 (+ 100% bonus AD)Total Physical Damage:180 / 225 / 270 / 315 / 360 (+ 200% bonus AD)Bonus Movement Speed:40 / 47.5 / 55 / 62.5 / 70%
Shadow Assault.description2: When Talon emerges from  invisibility, the blades converge to his location, dealing the same physical damage to all enemies they pass through. Breaking  invisibility with a basic attack or  Noxian Diplomacy causes the blades to converge to his target instead.
Shadow Assault.notes: *  Spell shield will block a single pass.
